A couple bug fixes and improvements.
iPhone X support and a couple bug fixes and improvements.
This update includes some bug fixes and performance improvements

This week we're excited to show off our newly revamped Whisk Home tab in our latest releaseâ€”making it easier to quickly find what you're looking for and discover new inspiration just for you.
With Whisk's new Home tab, you'll be able to quickly:
- Search communities and community recipes
- View upcoming meals on your meal plan
- See the latest recipes from communities you're a part of
- Get personalized recommendations for communities and recipes based on your food interests
You'll still be able to find your communities and explore new communities in the new "Communities" tab.
This update includes some bug fixes and performance improvements
This update includes some bug fixes and performance improvements

In this release, we've made a few improvements to make shopping and cooking with Whisk even easier. Now, you'll be able to:
- View your favorite items and quickly add them to your shopping list right from your Home tab
- Convert recipe ingredients from metric to imperial units with just one tap
This update includes some bug fixes and performance improvements
